Description of incident: A customer notified Mission Linen Supply of unauthorized charges on the credit cards of several other customers.  Mission Linen Supply discovered that the third party vendor who stores and maintains purchase information for their web stores had a data breach.  The unnamed vendor experienced an unauthorized access of their file servers.  Customers who made online purchases may have had their credit or debit card numbers, expiration dates, and possibly name and other payment card information compromised. The customer contacted Mission Linen Supply on June 29, but it is unclear when the vendor experienced the data breach.
